top_comments.comment: I remember Cheryl Tiegs as the Cover Girl model for their Clean makeup line!  Late 70's I believe.  I really enjoy their mascaras and their TruBlend bush in Love Me is really pretty.  Love those Milani blushes on you.  Lovely look!

comments_since_last_sample.body: Here’s how old I am: I remember Cheryl Tiegs being the face of CoverGirl, lol!
Here is dubai we work sundays …. For me your videos are amazing to start my day ❤️
Great look.. it's interesting to see you pull a look out of palettes and blushes never used before... and ahhhhh the smell of noxema!
Please do a video with the bright coloured eye palettes soon! I’d love to use the ones I have but also am so intimidated by colors, so would love your guidance!
Well, was hoping for the other eye shadow palette. 😕
persona cosmetics and lisa eldridge's reviews please 🥺
Omg...  "Was that just my stomach growling or was that a child?".... LOL  That was so funny on so many levels, Emily!!! LOLLL
The Noxema smell! Classic.
Wasn't there a plumy brown that was similar in one of the "Bae" palettes?
Well, this is super crazy but the smell of the noxzema infused clean makeup was the beginning of my love of makeup. (As a kid smelling my moms makeup bag)
CG has a new commercial with Niki Taylor in it!
Which weather app do you use?
Emily, I see why you have 1 million plus followers, your personality is so easy going snd “cute”.  You’re a sweet soul.

I remember Cheryl Tiegs as the Cover Girl model for their Clean makeup line!  Late 70's I believe.  I really enjoy their mascaras and their TruBlend bush in Love Me is really pretty.  Love those Milani blushes on you.  Lovely look!
My dad, 80 years old, tested positive for covid last week. Talk about losing track of a week of your life. I feel you. He came through it just fine, thankfully. Hope your mom and dad are doing OK.
😭 ok we'll wait for the other palette. I was hoping CoverGirl would get on board soon  and upgrade their formula. Thanks as always for the tutorial!
I may need to play with that foundation again 😁is that desert heat eyeshadow palette a dupe for urban decay naked heat🤔?

Love 💖 always.
I'm gonna be 65 soon and I don't have lots of room on my lids, really never did.  Can you do a look for old eyes?  I'm so not doing 65 very well.
I boop myself every single time I put mascara on Em! Lol
I started to LOVE CG clean makeup when I started getting fine lines. It really makes my just look hydrated with just enough coverage
